name: The other side ({DevLab})
description:
Discover what is on the other side. This is  a classy flashy zombie game using only geometric shapes.  

Controls : arrows keys , or wasd . Use mouse to shoot and rotate gun.

Genre : shooter, zombie, jam game. 

warning : this game uses  flashy / flashing colors. 

As developer, i always  jump first on graphics   but this jam is  an excellent practice because  geometric shapes force me to work on sounds, soundscapes etc ...  to create an atmosphere  different from the visual.   ... the guitar it's me, i know it's bad , but you know ...having some fun :)
